page.title: 07A 9 year old on School.
page.content: {Tracey Fielding writes, } I like coming to school because I can see and talk to my friends. Also I like it because I enjoy some of the lessons, like P.E.,Art, Reading, History and Maths. If I did not come to school, I would not be able to learn. Also, if I stayed at home everyday I would get bored, because in the seven week holiday, I get bored. I do not like coming to school because I do not like some of the lessons, such as Geography and Science, and I do not like assemblies. I try my best at school because I think it might help me to get a job when I grow up. I am also not keen on school because if you misbehave you get told off, but I think that that is only for your own good.
